api.title: DIVERA 24/7 Setup
api.description: Please enter your access key to connect to the DIVERA 24/7 servers and retrieve data. You can find the access key in your user account under 'Settings' in the 'Debug' section. For more information, visit: https://app.divera247.com/account/einstellungen.html

data.base_url: The server address of DIVERA 24/7 (usually left unchanged)

user_cluster_relation.description: A DIVERA 24/7 account can have multiple units simultaneously. By default, only the main unit is loaded.

reconfigure_confirm.description: Reconfigure the entry for your user.

vehicle_name_selection.title: Vehicle Name Selection
vehicle_name_selection.description: Choose which name field to use for vehicle sensors. You can change this later in the integration options.

abort.only_one_unit: This user has only one unit.
abort.not_supported: This access key is not supported. Please use a user’s access key.

init.title: DIVERA 24/7 Options
init.description: The update interval must be between 10 and 300 seconds. Choosing too short an interval can cause problems. The vehicle name selection determines which name field is used for vehicle sensors.
